welcome_heading: Welcome to the zero-waste phygital canteen
tut_one: Order your formulas in a few minutes
tut_second: Designate your boxes and fill your pot
coming_soon_subtitle: You will be able to access all the features of the application very soon.
qr_heading: I scan the QR code of my consigned boxes!
qr_sub_heading: The QR code can be found on the product packaging.
incorrect_login: The email address and / or the password entered are incorrect. Please check them and try again.
qr_header: I scan the QR code of my consigned boxes!
qr_sub_header: The QR code can be found on the product packaging.
no_box: You have no box to return
camera_access: i-Lunch needs camera access to scan QR codes.
already_scanned_heading: This QR code has already been scanned
already_scanned_sub_heading: Please place your box in the storage room to be credited
help_sub_heading:
Place your box in the deposit box and send an email to notify customer service.

We will re-credit you upon receipt of the container!
before_your_choice: Before you feast, check your choice.
